Features and benefits – TPU heelcounter provides enough comfort and firmness – Made with small, self-breathing […]
item.content:encoded:
Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 Men

The Nike AirZoom Hyperace 2 is a technical and lightweight indoor shoe with perfect damping. By using the right colors combined with the Nike logo, this shoe has a sharp and sporty appearance.

Features and benefits
– TPU heelcounter provides enough comfort and firmness
– Made with small, self-breathing holes that keep your feet cool, dry and active
– The forefoot has some sort of airbag that gives an even better feeling while turning or moving quickly
– The back of the shoe fits sporty to the heel and won’t let you slide

item.title: I Love Volleyball Sweater Men
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: I Love Volleyball Sweater Men Show the world that you have a sport heart! The I love sweater is extremely comfortable, has an excellent fit and it is made from high-quality materials. In short, you can say this sweater is a huge improvement compared to the first edition I Love sweater. The hoodie has two […]
item.content:encoded:
I Love Volleyball Sweater Men

Show the world that you have a sport heart! The I love sweater is extremely comfortable, has an excellent fit and it is made from high-quality materials. In short, you can say this sweater is a huge improvement compared to the first edition I Love sweater. The hoodie has two kangaroo pockets and a comfortable hood. The weight is only 280 gram and the materials used are 80% cotton and 20% polyester.

When you tumble dry the sweater it can shrink a little.

Color: Red
SKU: K476-RED-IBW

item.title: Hummel Lyon Shirt Women
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Hummel Lyon Shirt is an excellent shirt which is slightly longer when compared to a regular Hummel shirt. Experience freedom of movement and focus on your game. Features and Benefits – Quick dry stretchy material – Slim fit – 100% ClimaTec offers excellent ventilation – Authentic Hummel chevrons Color: Black / Pink SKU: 110001-8630
item.content:encoded:
The Hummel Lyon Shirt is an excellent shirt which is slightly longer when compared to a regular Hummel shirt. Experience freedom of movement and focus on your game.

Features and Benefits
– Quick dry stretchy material
– Slim fit
– 100% ClimaTec offers excellent ventilation
– Authentic Hummel chevrons

Color: Black / Pink
SKU: 110001-8630

item.title: Mikasa MVA2000 Volleyball
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Mikasa MVA2000 is the ideal ball for recreational use. This volleyball is provided with a rubber/nylon cover, making it suited for both indoor and outdoor use. Features and benefits – Weight: 260-280 gram – Circumference: 65-67 cm – Size 5 Color: Yellow / Blue SKU: BAL0115020
item.content:encoded:
The Mikasa MVA2000 is the ideal ball for recreational use. This volleyball is provided with a rubber/nylon cover, making it suited for both indoor and outdoor use.

Features and benefits
– Weight: 260-280 gram
– Circumference: 65-67 cm
– Size 5

Color: Yellow / Blue
SKU: BAL0115020
